Package com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features

Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
The available feature descriptors are listed in PosTaggerFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PosTaggedTokenAddressFunction<T>  
    PosTaggedTokenFeature<T,Y>
    A feature defined on a pos-tagged token, which can either be used when pos-tagging on the history of the current task, or when parsing, after referring to an individual pos-tag.
    PosTaggedTokenWrapper
    A simple wrapper for a pos-tagged token, useful to allow multiple feature contexts to act all as a PosTaggedToken for PosTaggedToken features.
    PosTaggerFeature<T>
    An interface for features which depend on the current PosTaggerContext, that is, the history of decisions already taken by the POS tagger.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLexicalAttributeFeature<T>
    For a given set of lexical attributes, returns one String per combination found in a lexical entry associated with this pos-tagged token.
    AbstractLexicalAttributesFeature<T>
    For a given set of lexical attributes, combines all values found in the lexicon into a single String.
    AbstractPosTaggedTokenAddressFunction
    An empty abstract class for easily creating address functions.
    AbstractPosTaggedTokenFeature<T,Y>
    An Abstract base class for features applied to a given pos-tagged token.
    AbstractPosTaggerFeature<T>
    An Abstract base class for features which depend on the current PosTaggerContext, that is, the history of decisions already taken by the POS tagger.
    AllLemmasFeature<T>
    All of the lemmas for a given pos-tagged token as supplied by the lexicon.
    AssignedPosTagFeature<T>
    The pos-tag assigned to a given token.
    AssignedPosTagInFeature<T>
    Is the pos-tag assigned to this token one of the given list.
    ClosedClassFeature<T>
    Whether or not the pos-tag assigned to this token is a closed-class category.
    CombinedLexicalAttributesFeature<T>
    For a given set of lexical attributes, combines all values found in the lexicon into a single String.
    GrammaticalCaseFeature<T>
    The grammatical case of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    GrammaticalGenderFeature<T>
    The grammatical gender of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    GrammaticalNumberFeature<T>
    The grammatical number of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    GrammaticalPersonFeature<T>
    The grammatical person of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    HistoryAbsoluteAddressFunction
    Returns a pos-tagged token from the current history by its absolute index in the sentence.
    HistoryCountIfFeature
    Counts the pos-tagged tokens within a certain range matching a certain criterion.
    The range is given in absolute indexes.
    If start > end, returns null.
    If no end is provided, assumes it should go till end of the current history.
    HistoryHasFeature<T>
    Checks whether a given pos-tagged token meets a certain criterion.
    HistorySearchFeature
    Returns the first token in a given range which matches a certain criterion, or null if no such token is found.
    If a start index is provided as a second argument, will start looking at this index, otherwise at the current token's index-1.
    If an end index is provided as a third argument, will continue until the end index, otherwise until token 0.
    All indexes must be <= the current history size, otherwise only valid indexes will be looked at.
    If start index >= end index, will look backwards, otherwise will look forwards.
    LemmaFeature<T>
    The first lemma (where first is arbitrary, but will always be the same for a given word form) of a given pos-tagged token as supplied by the lexicon.
    LexicalAttributeFeature<T>
    For a given set of lexical attributes, returns one String per combination found in a lexical entry associated with this pos-tagged token.
    LexicalCategoryFeature<T>
    The main grammatical category of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    LexicalSubCategoryFeature<T>
    The grammatical sub-category of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    MorphologyFeature<T>
    The detailed morpho-syntaxic information of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    NgramFeature
    Retrieves the tags assigned to the previous N tokens.
    Will only return results if the current index >= N-2 (to avoid multiple start tokens).
    This ensures that we don't repeat exactly the same information in 4-grams, trigrams, bigrams, etc.
    PossessorNumberFeature<T>
    The grammatical number of the possessor of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    PosTaggedTokenAddressFunctionWrapper<T>  
    PosTaggedTokenIndexFeature<T>
    The index of a given token in the token sequence.
    PosTaggerFeatureParser
    The central class for parsing a descriptor containing pos-tagger features.
    PosTaggerHistoryAddressFunction
    Returns a pos-tagged token in the current history, at a position relative to the current token.
    PosTaggerRule
    A PosTaggerRule is specified by a boolean feature and a PosTag.
    If the boolean feature evaluates to true, the token will automatically be assigned the PosTag in question, without taking any further decisions.
    Negative rules are also possible: in this case, the PosTag in question is eliminated from the set of possible PosTags (unless no other PosTags are possible).
    VerbAspectFeature<T>
    The verb aspect of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    VerbMoodFeature<T>
    The verb mood of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    VerbTenseFeature<T>
    The tense of a given token as supplied by the lexicon.
    WordFormFeature<T>
    The actual text of a given token.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features Description

Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
The available feature descriptors are listed in PosTaggerFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
